title: Itoya 11 x 17 spine insert measurements
content: Anyone have specs on the Itoya 11 x 17 spine insert? I don't have one handy.
author: kylehickman

comments.content: I don't either, but if you're referring to the V-PF-17 portfolio (which can be Googled), the spine appears to be about 1.5" wide by the full 17".
On the 11x17 Art Profolio, the spine insert is 3.75 x 17.75 with about .75 over the spine and 1.5 wrapped on the front and back.

Thank you.

You all rock.

I love this site!
